attributes.additional_details:
The reason being is that:
1. Its really bad for the environment
2. It terrifies pets (Dogs, Cats, etc)
3. They are very dangerous
4. It scares young childern
So please can you restrict fireworks to organised displays only.
attributes.background: Ban Fireworks from being sold to the public, Fireworks should only be for organised displays

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868
